room_title: Escape room "The Oval-ish Office" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: What a great time! We did the ovalish office. We will be back for the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Oval-ish Office" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: We just finished the Oval Office room. It was my first escape room, but others in the group had done one before. We all enjoyed it and had a lot of fun. Brian was a lot of fun and does a great job! I would definitely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "The Oval-ish Office" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: I've done a lot of different escape rooms and this was one of my favorites. Everyone in our group had a very good time. The host was extremely helpful and Engaged. I highly recommend this location and the Ovalish office escape room.

room_title: Escape room "The Oval-ish Office" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: Had a great time. Worth every penny. The Oval Office was a real challenge. There were only five of us and we escaped with just minutes to spare. At first we were a little disappointed at how small the room was but I'll just say, that didn't last long. We had a slow start, this being the first escape room for all, but once we got the hang of it, progressed at a steady pace. There was encouragement from the super nice man in charge of our group... I mean from the President, along the way. Would highly recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "The Oval-ish Office" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: Best escape room experience I've ever had. We did the Oval-ish office. So well designed with many clever puzzles! Very challenging - bring someone smart. Brian was an excellent host and gives a great tutorial for those new to escape rooms. This is a hidden treasure in the heart of the Loop not to be missed.
